The MeyerPerin Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to the advancement of science and technology, with a preferred focus on Artificial Intelligence and Education. 

We are especially interested in helping neurodivergent people thrive in their scientific and technical pursuits, especially those with Autism and ADHD.
